author: Addy Bink
title: Some U.S. governors calling for removal of Russian vodka, products

author: The Associated Press
title: 'We have to stand up:' US govs impose sanctions on Russia
'We have to stand up:' US govs impose sanctions on Russia

sentence: In Ohio, Governor Mike DeWine moved to halt the purchase and sale of all vodka made by Russian Standard, a renowned, Russian-owned liquor company.
author: Alex Hammer For Dailymail.Com
title: Groundswell of states demand BAN on Russian imports like caviar, furs and candy as bars pour out the few brands of vodka made in Moscow
Editorial: Why not a state gas tax holiday, Gov. Wolf?
